==Functional Requirements==
 * 1 Account Management:
  * 1.1 System shall provide a "Registration Module" 
   * 1.1.1  In order to register , users have to provide their names, emails and date of birth
   * 1.1.2 In order to avoid fake users such as bots or spammers Registration procedure should include CAPTCHA and Email validation
   * 1.1.3 System shall provide password remainder . If a user forget his password he should enter his email address a new created password should be sent to user


 * 2 Profile Management:
  * 2.1 System shall provide  Profile Management .
  * 2.1.1 Users should be able to update their Picture, location, website and email addresses

 * 3. Friendship Management
  * 3.1 Users shall follow their friends , in which game they participate.
  * 3.2 System shall provide messaging between friends

 * 5 Game Creator
  * 5.1 System shall provide a game type creation module for Game Creators.
   * 5.1.1 Game Creators are assigned by System administrator.
   * 5.1.2 Game Creators shouldn't use system without training for a specific amount of time. (How a new game type created etc)

 * 6 Commercial Users
  * 6.1 System Shall Provide a commercial user Module.
   * 6.1.1 Commercial Users shall pay to use system (via paypal) and accept term of use.
   * 6.1.2 Commercial users may hire a Game Creator for their "adverorial" games or prefer a free online-training 


 * 7 Authentication Module
  * 7.1 System shall provide an authentication module
   * 7.1.1 Users shall have different access levels as Administrator , Game Creator , Commercial User and Standard User


 * 8 Game Creation Module
  * 8.1 System shall provide a game Creation Module
  * 8.1.1 Game Creator shall design each step of a game type
  * 8.1.1.1 A game consists of several steps which designed by game creator 
  * 8.1.2 Each step consist of an input output and next step
  * 8.1.3 Game designer specify each steps input output and which is next step after completion of current step

 * 9 QR Code Generation Module
  * 9.1 System shall provide a wizard which creates QR Code with desired data and in desired sizes

 * 10 Training module
  * 10.1 System shall provide a training module
  * 10.2 Game creator shall be trained by a system-supported video
  * 10.3 Game Creator shall prepare "screencasts" in order to show how they game types are played
